attributes.action: Make it a law for all England World Cup games to be shown in schools
attributes.additional_details: It’s one or two lessons every week.
attributes.background: Schools aren’t letting us watch the World Cup England games, it only happens once every four yearsz

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether and what television to show children at school are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.
